main_text:
Logic
3. Logic

Due to the affinity of many ideas of Bolzano’s logic with ideas
of modern logic, attempts to reconstruct Bolzano’s logic by
means of techniques of modern logic started very early, e.g., with
Dubislav 1931 and Scholz 1937. The first overall reconstruction of
Bolzano’s logic from the perspective of modern logic was given
by Berg 1962, and Berg went into it further in his illuminating
introductions to WL in BGA I, 11–14. A new overall survey of
Bolzano’s logic was presented in Sebestik 1992, and the most
recent one is Casari 2016.
